original_text: Whom I would have retained with me, that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel:
korean_text: 그를 내게 머물러 있게 하여 내 복음을 위하여 갇힌 중에서 네 대신 나를 섬기게 하고자 하나

sentences.original_text: Whom I would have retained with me,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나와 함께 머물게 하고자 하는 사람을,

sentences.original_text: he might have ministered unto me
in the bonds of the gospel:
